p: In the Probate court of Whitman County Washington Territory Before WN Ruby Probate Judge
In the matter of the adoption of Daisy Geneva Departte a minor

Comes now the mother of the child above named by her attorney WM H Furman and Mark A Fullerton and the court to open the decree in the above entitled cause and allow said mother to make a showing and defence against said proceedings and and have said motion upon the following affidavits of Elizabeth Departte and U.P. Hately Elurch annexed and made a part of this motion.
WM Furuman and Mark A Fullerton
